author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:
- Fix race condition when a task empties at the same time a new task is added to an empty task queue.
- Improved task waiting in FWCore/Concurrency tests
  - Replaced looping over tbb::task_group::wait calls with use of edm::FinalWaitingTask.
  - Added another case where REQUIRE needs to be synchronized

This is meant to try to address infrequent failures of the test where the test hangs forever.
#### PR validation:

The unit test runs.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1467
title: Fix race condition in SerialTaskQueue
